ticket_purchasing_tips.ways_to_save: Consider attending games on weekdays for potentially lower ticket prices. Explore group ticket discounts. Check for last-minute ticket deals close to game day.
ticket_purchasing_tips.avoiding_scalpers: Purchase tickets from verified sources to avoid counterfeit tickets. Utilize secondary marketplaces with buyer protections. Be cautious when considering tickets sold outside the venue.
